ygData.subject: Re: weapon ideas?
ygData.msgSnippet: Rob, but do you lose any stamina at all?  Im sure str and stamina has some bearing on this.  I doubt an Ogre with maxed str and 145 stamina would lose any at
ygData.messageBody:
Rob,

but do you lose any stamina at all? Im sure str and stamina has some
bearing on this. I doubt an Ogre with maxed str and 145 stamina would lose
any at all once his skill is up.

> ----------
> From: slu@...[SMTP:slu@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 8:10 AM
> To: Mifsud, Michael; 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: re: Re: [warriors_eq] weapon ideas?
>
> Michael
>
> I obtained a dwarven axe over the weekend. With dual wield (DA & Mino) I
> don't even come close to running out of stamina now, even with double
> attack (which I also got over the weekend). And this included extensive
> experimenting in long fights slashing Emperor Crush on the head.
>
> I guess its just the dual mino wield that is the Sta hog (heavy
> buggers)...everyone else be warned (at least those of you at lower levels
> (13-16) who are tempted to wield dual minos)
>
> Rob
>
>
